discourse_list.title: EIP-4399: How to use PREVRANDAO in evm?

content.content: I didn’t find the documents about how to use random source in evm using solidity? Is there a way to access the randao number in a specific block just like the funtion: blockhash(uint blockNumber) returns (bytes32)?
content.GPT-summary: The post is a question about how to use a specific feature in the EVM using Solidity. The author is asking if there is a way to access the randao number in a specific block and is seeking guidance on how to use the PREVRANDAO feature.
